mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.logo AS "logo", a.xxmc AS "xxmc", a.xcjs AS "xcjs", a.xxbq AS "xxbq", a.lxr AS "lxr", a.lxdz AS "lxdz", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.bmnd AS "bmnd", a.kssj AS "kssj", a.jzsj AS "jzsj", a.sfks AS "sfks", a.xxlj AS "xxlj", a.bmb_mb AS "bmbMb", a.zkz_mb AS "zkzMb", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.creator AS "creator", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_xxpz( owid, xxbh, logo, xxmc, xcjs, xxbq, lxr, lxdz, lxdh, bmnd, kssj, jzsj, sfks, xxlj, bmb_mb, zkz_mb, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, creator, createtime, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{xxbh}, #{logo}, #{xxmc}, #{xcjs}, #{xxbq}, #{lxr}, #{lxdz}, #{lxdh}, #{bmnd}, #{kssj}, #{jzsj}, #{sfks}, #{xxlj}, #{bmbMb}, #{zkzMb}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{creator}, #{createtime}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_xxpz SET owid = #{owid}, xxbh = #{xxbh}, logo = #{logo}, xxmc = #{xxmc}, xcjs = #{xcjs}, xxbq = #{xxbq}, lxr = #{lxr}, lxdz = #{lxdz}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, bmnd = #{bmnd}, kssj = #{kssj}, jzsj = #{jzsj}, sfks = #{sfks}, xxlj = #{xxlj}, bmb_mb = #{bmbMb}, zkz_mb = #{zkzMb}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, creator = #{creator}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.logo AS "logo", a.xxmc AS "xxmc", a.xcjs AS "xcjs", a.xxbq AS "xxbq", a.bmnd AS "bmnd", a.kssj AS "kssj", a.jzsj AS "jzsj", a.sfks AS "sfks", a.xxlj AS "xxlj" FROM bckj_biz_xxpz a
